scriptComments.dist: build a single packaged executable for distribution. See dist/ for output
scriptComments.dev: build using tsc and tsc-alias, and run the application with node. This works with debugger step-through. (Yah!).
scriptComments.devtsx: experiment. running with tsx. Its all good, except debugging into modules has incorrect line numbers and is sometimes minified.
scriptComments.testtsx: experiment testing using tsx to run typescript. While tsx works as promised it doesn't support debugging imported modules
scriptComments.tsc-alias: note on tsc-alias. It doesn't work with tsconfig references. alias paths in outdir are not replaced. Workaround, do not use reference but use a symlink to library.
